net.corda.core.serialization

Class SerializeAsTokenContext

  • net.corda.core.serialization.SerializeAsTokenContext

  • public class SerializeAsTokenContext

    A context for mapping SerializationTokens to/from SerializeAsTokens.

    A context is initialised with an object containing all the instances of interface SerializeAsToken to eagerly register all the tokens. In our case this can be the ServiceHub.

    Then it is a case of using the companion object methods on class SerializeAsTokenSerializer to set and clear context as necessary on the Kryo instance when serializing to enable/disable tokenization.

    See Also:
    interface SerializeAsToken, ServiceHub, class SerializeAsTokenSerializer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SerializeAsTokenContext(java.lang.Object toBeTokenized, com.esotericsoftware.kryo.Kryo kryo)
      A context for mapping SerializationTokens to/from SerializeAsTokens.
